our_mission_section.description: Elexoft Technologies is an IT Software Company founded in Sep 2015 in Pakistan. We are offering multiple services in Website Development, Graphic Designing, Digital Marketing, and We make CMS, CRM and provide ERP solutions. Elexoft is a top software house in Pakistan and also a registered company in Pakistan (PSEB). Additional services that we provide include website Designing, API's Development, SEO Services and IOS app development.
